about_me.TITLE: About me
about_me.ABOUT_ME: Hi, Iâ€™m a German speaking Frontend Developer based near Stendal. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
about_me.LOCATION: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Stendal and remotely.
about_me.CHALLENGE: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
about_me.MISSION: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

my_skills.TITLE: My skills
my_skills.EXPERIENCE: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
my_skills.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

portfolio.SELECTION_WORK: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

PROJECT.JOIN_DESCRIPTION: Task manager, inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag-and-drop functions, assign users and categories.
PROJECT.ELPOLLO_DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pedro find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer chicken.

contact.TITLE: Contact
contact.SUBTITLE: Got a problem to solve?
contact.DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form. I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas, and contributing to your projects with my work.
